caption: In the episode, the detective and his friend are invited to dine at a lady's home, while the detective also attempts to get closer to a media company boss, discovering he is a powerful individual who utilizes his resources to acquire more information and power. The media mogul, being knowledgeable about the detective, extends an invitation for a dinner in London. Highlighted moments involve the detective and his friend being invited to the lady's home for dinner, the detective exploring the world of the media boss, and learning about his potent influence and power. The media boss utilizes his resources to gather more information and authority, inviting the detective to a dinner in London, the detective discovering that the media mogulâ€™s office is an unreliable source of information, and learning that during the banquet, the media mogul will be dining with a sales team in London. Deciding to attend the dinner and take action, the detective finds that the media mogul has knowledge about his identity and tells his friend not to bring a weapon.
